value.title: Go serverless: Containers with Kubernetes and virtual nodes | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Think serverless is just for functions? Think again! Brendan Burns joins Donovan Brown to look at how serverless containers can provide a cloud-native container experience without the worry of a server or operating system. They also look at how this integrates with the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jGMaI7dKUgo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How do Power Apps differ from Azure Logic Apps? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
value.excerpt: Ever wondered the difference between Power Apps and Azure Logic Apps? In the One Dev Question series, Principal Cloud Advocate Dona Sarkar explains just how different they are.    For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/powerapps/powerapps-overview/?WT.mc_id=onedevquestion-c9-donasa

value.title: How to access GRUB on Ubuntu | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, Alfred from the Azure Serial Console team will show you how to enable GRUB on your Ubuntu virtual machine. value.title: How to add Azure Alerts as push notifications on your phone | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: The Azure mobile app allows you to receive Azure Alerts as push notifications on your mobile device. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how you can setup Azure Alerts such as metric alerts, log analytics, Application Insights, and Activity Log from Azure Monitor on the Azure portal.

value.title: How to create a Public IP Prefix to manage your Azure public endpoints | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Are you tired of managing your multiple public IP addresses in Azure? Anavi Nahar joins Donovan Brown to show how Public IP Prefix enables you to use one prefix to manage your public endpoints in Azure. You can have predictable, contiguous public IP addresses that don't change as you scale. With a prefix,

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure App Configuration to manage and secure application settings and secrets in a central place. We will also explore how Azure App Configuration helps you to dynamically enable and disable features in your application using feature flags.
